This ablity cannot ignore type or form changes granted by abilities, for example color change or forecast; nor effects that were caused by abilities but are no longer tied to an ability, such as the rain from drizzle.  This ability cannot ignore multitype at all.

An ability ignored by this ability is only nullified while the move is being used.  For example, this Pokémon's moves can paralyze a Pokémon with limber, but Limber will activate and heal the paralysis immediately thereafter, and this Pokémon's spikes are not affected by this ability after they have been placed.

When this Pokémon enters battle, all participating trainers are notified that it has this ability.

This ability functions identically to mold breaker and teravolt.

flavor_text.description:
Moves can be used on the target regardless of
its Abilities.

effect_texts.short_effect: Bypasses targets' abilities if they could hinder or prevent moves.
effect_texts.effect:
This Pokémon's moves completely ignore abilities that could hinder or prevent their effect on the target.

For example, this Pokémon's moves ignore abilities that would fully negate them, such as water absorb; abilities that would prevent any of their effects, such as clear body, shell armor, or sticky hold; and abilities that grant any general protective benefit, such as simple, snow cloak, or thick fat.  If an ability could either hinder or help this Pokémon's moves, e.g. dry skin or unaware, the ability is ignored either way.

Abilities that do not fit this description, even if they could hinder moves in some other way, are not affected.  For example, cursed body only affects potential future uses of the move, while liquid ooze and shadow tag can only hinder a move's effect on the user.  This ablity cannot ignore type or form changes granted by abilities, for example color change or forecast; nor effects that were caused by abilities but are no longer tied to an ability, such as the rain from drizzle.  This ability cannot ignore multitype at all.

An ability ignored by this ability is only nullified while the move is being used.  For example, this Pokémon's moves can paralyze a Pokémon with limber, but Limber will activate and heal the paralysis immediately thereafter, and this Pokémon's spikes are not affected by this ability after they have been placed.

When this Pokémon enters battle, all participating trainers are notified that it has this ability.

This ability functions identically to mold breaker and turboblaze.

flavor_text.description:
Protects itself and its allies from attacks that limit
their move choices.

effect_texts.short_effect: Protects allies against moves that affect their mental state.
effect_texts.effect: Protects allies against moves that affect their mental state.

flavor_text.description:
Ally Grass-type Pokémon are protected from
status conditions and the lowering of their stats.

effect_texts.short_effect: Protects friendly grass Pokémon from having their stats lowered by other Pokémon.
effect_texts.effect: Protects friendly grass Pokémon from having their stats lowered by other Pokémon.

flavor_text.description: Restores HP as well when the Pokémon eats a Berry.

effect_texts.short_effect: Restores HP upon eating a Berry, in addition to the Berry's effect.
effect_texts.effect: Restores HP upon eating a Berry, in addition to the Berry's effect.

flavor_text.description:
Changes the Pokémon’s type to the type of the
move it’s about to use.

effect_texts.short_effect: Changes the bearer's type to match each move it uses.
effect_texts.effect:
Changes the bearer's type to match each move it uses.

The type change takes place just before the move is used.

flavor_text.description: Halves the damage from physical moves.

effect_texts.short_effect: Halves damage from physical attacks.
effect_texts.effect: Halves damage from physical attacks.

flavor_text.description:
The Pokémon steals the held item of a Pokémon it
hits with a move.

effect_texts.short_effect: Steals the target's held item when the bearer uses a damaging move.
effect_texts.effect: Steals the target's held item when the bearer uses a damaging move.

flavor_text.description:
Protects the Pokémon from some ball and
bomb moves.

effect_texts.short_effect: Protects against bullet, ball, and bomb-based moves.
effect_texts.effect: Protects against bullet, ball, and bomb-based moves.

flavor_text.description:
Boosts the Sp. Atk stat sharply when a stat
is lowered.

effect_texts.short_effect: Raises Special Attack by two stages upon having any stat lowered.
effect_texts.effect: Raises Special Attack by two stages upon having any stat lowered.

flavor_text.description:
The Pokémon’s strong jaw boosts the power of its
biting moves.

effect_texts.short_effect: Strengthens biting moves to 1.5× their power.
effect_texts.effect: Strengthens biting moves to 1.5× their power.

flavor_text.description:
Normal-type moves become Ice-type moves.
The power of those moves is boosted a little.

effect_texts.short_effect: Turns the bearer's normal moves into ice moves and strengthens them to 1.3× their power.
effect_texts.effect: Turns the bearer's normal-type moves into ice-type moves.  Moves changed by this ability have 1.3× their power.

flavor_text.description: Prevents itself and ally Pokémon from falling asleep.

effect_texts.short_effect: Prevents friendly Pokémon from sleeping.
effect_texts.effect: Prevents friendly Pokémon from sleeping.

flavor_text.description:
The Pokémon changes its form to Blade Forme when
it uses an attack move and changes to Shield Forme
when it uses King’s Shield.

effect_texts.short_effect: Changes aegislash to Blade Forme before using a damaging move, or Shield Forme before using kings shield.
effect_texts.effect: Changes aegislash to Blade Forme before using a damaging move, or Shield Forme before using kings shield.

flavor_text.description:
Gives priority to Flying-type moves when
the Pokémon’s HP is full.

effect_texts.short_effect: Raises flying moves' priority by one stage.
effect_texts.effect: Raises flying moves' priority by one stage.

flavor_text.description: Powers up aura and pulse moves.

effect_texts.short_effect: Strengthens aura and pulse moves to 1.5× their power.
effect_texts.effect: Strengthens aura and pulse moves to 1.5× their power.

flavor_text.description:
Boosts the Pokémon’s Defense stat on
Grassy Terrain.

effect_texts.short_effect: Boosts Defense while grassy terrain is in effect.
effect_texts.effect: Boosts Defense while grassy terrain is in effect.

flavor_text.description:
The Pokémon passes its item to an ally that has
used up an item.

effect_texts.short_effect: Passes the bearer's held item to an ally when the ally uses up its item.
effect_texts.effect: Passes the bearer's held item to an ally when the ally uses up its item.

flavor_text.description: Powers up moves that make direct contact.

effect_texts.short_effect: Strengthens moves that make contact to 1.33× their power.
effect_texts.effect: Strengthens moves that make contact to 1.33× their power.

flavor_text.description:
Normal-type moves become Fairy-type moves.
The power of those moves is boosted a little.

effect_texts.short_effect: Turns the bearer's normal moves into fairy moves and strengthens them to 1.3× their power.
effect_texts.effect: Turns the bearer's normal-type moves into fairy moves.  Moves changed by this ability have 1.3× their power.

flavor_text.description:
Contact with the Pokémon lowers the attacker’s
Speed stat.

effect_texts.short_effect: Lowers attacking Pokémon's Speed by one stage on contact.
effect_texts.effect: Lowers attacking Pokémon's Speed by one stage on contact.

flavor_text.description:
Normal-type moves become Flying-type moves.
The power of those moves is boosted a little.

effect_texts.short_effect: Turns the bearer's normal moves into flying moves and strengthens them to 1.3× their power.
effect_texts.effect: Turns the bearer's normal-type moves into flying-type moves.  Moves changed by this ability have 1.3× their power.

flavor_text.description: Parent and child each attacks.

effect_texts.short_effect: Lets the bearer hit twice with damaging moves.  The second hit has half power.
effect_texts.effect: Lets the bearer hit twice with damaging moves.  The second hit has half power.

flavor_text.description: Powers up each Pokémon’s Dark-type moves.

effect_texts.short_effect: Strengthens dark moves to 1.33× their power for all friendly and opposing Pokémon.
effect_texts.effect: Strengthens dark moves for all friendly and opposing Pokémon.

flavor_text.description: Powers up each Pokémon’s Fairy-type moves.

effect_texts.short_effect: Strengthens fairy moves to 1.33× their power for all friendly and opposing Pokémon.
effect_texts.effect: Strengthens fairy moves for all friendly and opposing Pokémon.

flavor_text.description:
The effects of “Aura” Abilities are reversed
to lower the power of affected moves.

effect_texts.short_effect: Makes dark aura and fairy aura weaken moves of their respective types.
effect_texts.effect: While this Pokémon is on the field, dark aura and fairy aura weaken moves of their respective types to 2/3 their power, rather than strengthening them.

flavor_text.description:
The Pokémon changes the weather to nullify
Fire-type attacks.

effect_texts.short_effect: Creates heavy rain, which has all the properties of Rain Dance, cannot be replaced, and causes damaging Fire moves to fail.
effect_texts.effect:
When this Pokémon enters battle or gains this ability, the weather becomes heavy rain.  Heavy rain has all the properties of rain dance and also causes damaging Fire moves to fail.

Heavy rain ends when this Pokémon leaves battle or loses this ability, or when this ability is nullified.  The weather cannot otherwise be changed except by the effects of delta stream and desolate land.

air lock and cloud nine will prevent the effects of heavy rain, including allowing Fire moves to work, but will not allow the weather to be changed.

flavor_text.description:
The Pokémon changes the weather to nullify
Water-type attacks.

effect_texts.short_effect: Creates extremely harsh sunlight, which has all the properties of Sunny Day, cannot be replaced, and causes damaging Water moves to fail.
effect_texts.effect:
When this Pokémon enters battle or gains this ability, the weather becomes extremely harsh sunlight.  Extremely harsh sunlight has all the properties of sunny day and also causes damaging Water moves to fail.

Extremely harsh sunlight ends when this Pokémon leaves battle or loses this ability, or when this ability is nullified.  The weather cannot otherwise be changed except by the effects of delta stream and primordial sea.

air lock and cloud nine will prevent the effects of extremely harsh sunlight, including allowing Water moves to work, but will not allow the weather to be changed.

flavor_text.description:
The Pokémon changes the weather to eliminate all
of the Flying type’s weaknesses.

effect_texts.short_effect: Creates a mysterious air current, which cannot be replaced and causes moves to never be super effective against Flying Pokémon.
effect_texts.effect:
When this Pokémon enters battle or gains this ability, the weather becomes a mysterious air current.  A mysterious air current causes moves to not be super effective against Flying; they do neutral damage instead.  anticipation and stealth rock are not affected.

The mysterious air current ends when this Pokémon leaves battle or loses this ability, or when this ability is nullified.  The weather cannot otherwise be changed except by the effects of desolate land and primordial sea.

air lock and cloud nine will prevent the effect of a mysterious air current, but will not allow the weather to be changed.

flavor_text.description: Boosts the Defense stat when hit by an attack.

effect_texts.short_effect: Raises this Pokémon's Defense by one stage when it takes damage from a move.
effect_texts.effect: Raises this Pokémon's Defense by one stage when it takes damage from a move.

flavor_text.description:
The Pokémon cowardly switches out when its HP
becomes half or less.

effect_texts.short_effect: This Pokémon automatically switches out when its HP drops below half.
effect_texts.effect: After this Pokémon is hit by a move, if that move caused this Pokémon's HP to drop below half, it switches out.

flavor_text.description:
The Pokémon, sensing danger, switches out when its
HP becomes half or less.

effect_texts.short_effect: This Pokémon automatically switches out when its HP drops below half.
effect_texts.effect: After this Pokémon is hit by a move, if that move caused this Pokémon's HP to drop below half, it switches out.

flavor_text.description:
Boosts the Pokémon’s Defense stat sharply when hit
by a Water-type move.

effect_texts.short_effect: Raises this Pokémon's Defense by two stages when it's hit by a Water move.
effect_texts.effect: Raises this Pokémon's Defense by two stages when it's hit by a Water move.

flavor_text.description:
The Pokémon’s attacks become critical hits if the
target is poisoned.

effect_texts.short_effect: This Pokémon's moves critical hit against poisoned targets.
effect_texts.effect: This Pokémon's moves critical hit against poisoned targets.

flavor_text.description:
When its HP becomes half or less, the Pokémon’s
shell breaks and it becomes aggressive.

effect_texts.short_effect: Transforms this Minior between Core Form and Meteor Form.  Prevents major status ailments and drowsiness while in Meteor Form.
effect_texts.effect:
When this Pokémon enters battle and at the end of each turn, if its HP is 50% or above, it changes into Meteor Form; otherwise, it changes into Core Form.  In Meteor Form, it cannot be given a major status ailment (though existing ones are not cured), cannot become drowsy from yawn, and cannot use rest (which will simply fail).

This ability cannot be copied, replaced, or nullified.  This ability only takes effect for Minior.

flavor_text.description:
Doubles the damage dealt to the target’s
replacement if the target switches out.
